content: Santiago Figueira Santiago Figueira publications supervision notes links PhD in Computer Science Researcher at ICC, CONICET Professor at the Department of Computer Science FCEyN, University of Buenos Aires Pabellón 0+∞ - Ciudad Universitaria (C1428EGA) Buenos Aires - Argentina Office 2502 email: santiago at dc.uba.ar Research Groups: Director of GLyC - Logic, Language and Computability Research Group. Codirector of the Argentinian-French Laboratory SINFIN Université Paris-CNRS/Universidad de Buenos Aires-CONICET. Researcher of QuICC: Quantum Information, Computation, and Communication team.
